purpose: To evaluate AI agents' performance on web tasks by providing a structured framework and tools for analysis.
principle: Leverages Python for scripting and automation, using web scraping and task simulation to assess agent capabilities.
reusability: Offers a modular framework with customizable evaluation metrics and easy integration with different AI agents.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for diverse web tasks and agent types.
name: bananalyzer
description: Open source AI Agent evaluation framework for web tasks üêíüçå
highlight: Provides a comprehensive framework for evaluating AI agents on web tasks with detailed metrics.
